unnormalised: Interesting read on Ayurveda! My grandma, Shanti aunty, swears by it. She visits the Dhanwantari Ayurvedic College in Kerala every year around Diwali. Says it keeps her going strong! Started after 15/08/1947, apparently. Last visit cost her around Rs. 5000, I think. She says Dr. Sharma there is amazing. Maybe I'll try it sometime around 26/01/2024! Has anyone tried the Panchakarma at 14:00 hrs?
normalised: Interesting read on Ayurveda! My grandma, Shanti aunty, swears by it. She visits the Dhanwantari Ayurvedic College in Kerala every year around Diwali. Says it keeps her going strong! Started after fifteenth August nineteen forty seven, apparently. Last visit cost her around rupee five thousand, I think. She says Doctor Sharma there is amazing. Maybe I'll try it sometime around twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four! Has anyone tried the Panchakarma at fourteen hundred hours?
